guide.conclusion: A Nook tablet with limited Android capabilities.

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This guide is for people that wish to have Android on their Nook but don't want to do any complicated rooting processes. The reason I made this is because I tried to root my Nook tablet with no results at all and it was a waste of time; rooting may work for you but may not. I hope you enjoy the simple project below. :)
guide.introduction_rendered:
This guide is for people that wish to have Android on their Nook but don't want to do any complicated rooting processes. The reason I made this is because I tried to root my Nook tablet with no results at all and it was a waste of time; rooting may work for you but may not. I hope you enjoy the simple project below. :)

Relevant parts
  • Nook Tablet

lines.text: First, and most important, you must own either a Nook tablet or color with 1.4.0 software.
lines.text_raw: First, and most important, you must own either a Nook tablet or color with 1.4.0 software.

lines.text: If you have installed 1.4.1 this mod will not work.
lines.text_raw: If you have installed 1.4.1 this mod will not work.

lines.text: If you have 1.4.1 go here, download the file and follow the steps.
lines.text_raw: If you have 1.4.1 go [http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1402190|here], download the file and follow the steps.

lines.text: Now go online and look up "Go Launcher free download" and find a good site. Or you can look for ADW Launcher which is for more advanced users.
lines.text_raw: Now go online and look up "Go Launcher free download" and find a good site. Or you can look for ADW Launcher which is for more advanced users.

lines.text: Make sure when you open it on the Nook to press "Package Installer".
lines.text_raw: Make sure when you open it on the Nook to press "Package Installer".

lines.text: If you press "App Installer" then you will need to re-download the launcher.
lines.text_raw: If you press "App Installer" then you will need to re-download the launcher.

lines.text: Now just search your Nook for it and when you find it, press it and it will open and, PRESTO!! your Nook has (limited) Android capabilities!
lines.text_raw: Now just search your Nook for it and when you find it, press it and it will open and, PRESTO!! your Nook has (limited) Android capabilities!

lines.text: When you want to download an app you must go to the online Android market.
lines.text_raw: When you want to download an app you must go to the online Android market.

lines.text: Don't keep your wireless on when it sleeps or it'll download the 1.4.1 software and ruin all your hard work. :(
lines.text_raw: Don't keep your wireless on when it sleeps or it'll download the 1.4.1 software and ruin all your hard work. :(

guide.summary: How to give your Nook tablet/color Android capability without rooting.
guide.title: Nook Tablet Android Hack
